Player History
Drafted in 11th round, 124th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2019...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Toronto on 4/1/2019 (Going to PIT: P Dennis Erler. Going to TOR: 3B Ronald Delrosario)...

Won Conference Championship with Toronto in 2019...
